en.about-description: I'm an engineer with an evolving passion for software development, driven by a natural inclination for analytical thinking and problem solving. What began as curiosity has grown into a deep commitment to understanding how things work behind the screen and how to build them. Through consistent self-study, I've been focusing on front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, enjoying the process of turning ideas into interactive, meaningful interfaces. I'm now looking for my first opportunity in tech where I can contribute, grow, and continue learning alongside others.

en.projects-description: Every project shown here was built from scratch applying the concepts that I have learnt, using technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Sass, Tailwind and React.

en.motivation: This is just the beginning! Stay tunned for more! Thank you for visiting!

es.about-description: Soy un ingeniero con una pasión creciente por el desarrollo de software, impulsada por una inclinación natural hacia el pensamiento analítico y la resolución de problemas. Lo que comenzó como curiosidad, se ha convertido en un compromiso profundo con entender cómo funcionan las cosas por dentro y cómo construirlas. A través del autoaprendizaje constante, me he centrado en tecnologías front-end como HTML, CSS, JavaScript y React, disfrutando del proceso de convertir ideas en interfaces interactivas y con sentido. Actualmente, busco mi primera oportunidad en el sector tecnológico, en un entorno donde pueda aportar, crecer y seguir aprendiendo junto a otros.
